title: Back out of chat while handling request message locks user out chat input
body:
**Title:** 	 got to a state where I opened a chat again and there is empty suggestions area and I cannot seem to exit it by pressing back or delete

**Number:** 	 5

**URL:** 	 https://instabug.com/applications/status-10bb8cbc-15f6-44f0-8c7a-db478dc34d7d/beta/bugs/5

**Memory:** 	 2324.0/3562.0 MB

**Battery:** 	 100, Charging through USB cable

**App Version:** 	 1.0 (1)

**Duration:** 	 17

- Tap on Request message from user
- Press Back button
- Re-open chat with same user
